title: Ze Art ov ze Iced Mocha & Beyond
name: Ze Art ov ze Iced Mocha & Beyond
description:
A Map by Madamegonzaga

Some baristas got it und some baristas donut. Heer wee shall map only zoze zat gots it. Ze otters wee shall poot on ice!

properties.name: Bean Bag Coffee House
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  601 Divisadero Street, San Francisco, CA, 94117Bean Bag Coffee House 415-563-3634

properties.name: Bluebottle Coffee Commpany
properties.description: Posted by Caterina 315 Linden St, San Francisco, caA real hole in the wall, but fantastic coffee. On sunny days, they will set out tables on the sidewalk, or grab a cup as you\'re buying shoes in Hayes Valley.

properties.name: Cafe Reverie
properties.description: Posted by Mcmcilvoy  848 Cole St, San Francisco, CACafe Reverie is Cole Valley\'s communal heart. Patio out back. The sidewalk out front is the home of the Poetry Canvass. We may have missed the butterflies from here. Trying to Find a Botanist My campaign to meet a botanist has never really been on solid footing. Our first mistake was starting our search by agreeing not to go to the one place we could be confident there were botanists, the conservatory of flowers.

properties.name: Caffe Trieste
properties.description: Posted by Sreudianflip  609 Vallejo St, San Francisco, CA, 94102Caffe Trieste 415415-982550-26051239

properties.name: Carley ov Oakside Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  1195 Oak Street, San Francisco CA Adorable barista Carley maykeths ze mean mocha und nose ze joys ov subliminal advertising! Allso on ze Madame\'s list ov favrits from ze Oakside Cafe: iced moooocha, vanilla latte, bacon bacon bacon cheese bagels! I lyke tou roost in ze bird\'s nest und doo ze wry tings ov letters tou mein grandmuzzle. Last time I was zare I snoopied on ze guise planning ze gnu hipster bar in ze City. Bah! Doo wee rilly knead anuzzle hipster bar? I prefer ze eavesdrooping on more juicy convos, lyke Dixie talkin\' \'bout herr crazy kinks! Butt no mattle wot wot aryoo overhear or donut, zeez eez ze cofffeeeeine shoppe wif ze moist cake so donut overloox ze fluffly array ov sweet loaf treats!

properties.name: Ceasar Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  208 Valencia Street, San Francisco CA Good Morning, Glory! Some of the good folks of Ceasar Cafe: Edith, The Great Mario, and Joan. _____________________ If you\'ve lived in the City for awhile, you\'ve probably enjoyed one of Joan and Sam\'s fine homey coffee shops. They were on Valencia near New College at one time and that\'s where I first came to depend on them for my morning jolt. Now they\'re further up Valencia, still serving up a decent meal for a fair price--in fact the menu is pretty robust and even tastier these days. I was impressed by the generous girth of my breakfast crepe and would have happily shared halfsies with a friend. Salads, bagels, sandwiches, caffeine, whatever keeps ya going, get it here. ___________ Open Monday through Friday 6:30AM-10PM, Saturday 8AM-10PM, Sunday 8AM-8PM (grill closes at 7PM on Sundays) 415.621.3800

properties.name: Coffee to the People
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  1206 Masonic, san francisco caCaffffeeeeeine! Free internet, mocha (iced or hot), pastries, pasties, sammiches. Nice mix ov ze peeps und good beans not from bad man lands, arooooooo! Get ze leetl cod und after I donut nose how many moooochas, aryoo veal get vun fur freee. Ze fauxtoe ov ze colorfullly spreeeenkleded cafffeeeeeine over zare on ze right eez ze whitey mochachacha.

properties.name: Crepe Express: Taste Paris!
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne 1476 Haight Street, San Francisco CA Danielle and Brian creating heavenly crepes. ~~~~ Sweet or savory>? My usual is the Opera (ham/swiss/mushrooms) but I\'ve been known to go to the Louvre (dark chocolate sauce) on occasion. The efficient workers here always deliver the goods and the mochas are surprisingly delicious for a place that specializes in something else. You can always swig Orangina or French Limonade if it\'s too late for caffeine--but it\'s really never too late for caffeine, is it? I seem to forget when ensconced in the wafting aromatic goodness of crepes, but the crepe-shy can also get a pretty good salad (Spinach salad with feta/red onions and tomatoes, Nicoise, Gorgonzola/Walnut) or opt for a baguette. Tables aren\'t guaranteed but it\'s okay to tell someone to scoot the heck over...or you can get your goodies to go if you\'re a good juggler. Consistently excellent service and taste. __________ Open 7days from 9:30am-10pm weekdays, 11pm on Fridays and Saturdays. 415.865.0264

properties.name: Crossroads Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Fritz  699 Delancey St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Dolores Park Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Mcmcilvoy    501 Dolores St, San Francisco, CABreakfast on the day of yarn shopping. Ran into my old friend Pete. Bagels!

properties.name: Ed's Family at Java Supreme Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   703 Guerrero Street, San Francisco CA Ze goood hot cup o\'cafffeeeeeeine und nicing conversation eez all zeez dogging kneads in ze mournings. Und ze nicey icey mocha fur ze afternooners. Ed und heez family provides. Donut mist ze good drawlings by Jessica und ze moveable feast art show adorning ze walls. Sammiches, pita, bagels, mocha, iced mocha, tea, und treats! 415.206.1TEA

properties.name: Farley's
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    1315 18th Street, San Francisco, CAFarley\'s goal is to create a focal point for the community where everyone is comfortable and feels welcome. By creating a personable place, a human place, Farley\'s provides an arena for people to interact with one another. The character of Farley\'s mirrors the uniqueness of the people and allows for a genuine and distinctive experience for everyone.

properties.name: Karla ov Cafe La Taza
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  470 Post Street, San Francisco CA 94102 Ze pulled pork panini wif chipotle mayonnaise eez ze way tou goose. Add ze iced mocha, ze cookie, und mebbe ze leetl Caesar salad und aryooo veal bee ze happy camper. Nice barista, efficient service, clean, gut tasty meats. Iced mocha ze vay Goose intendeded.

properties.name: Lam ov Tu Lan Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   8 Sixth Street, San Francisco CA Lam Phung, ze unassuming waiter at Tu Lan Restaurant, brightened palpitatinglyish when axed tou bee een ze Madame\'s moobie! Hee blossoms lyke ze flower und heez smile eez as goode az ze Vietnamese iced cafffffeeeeeeeeeine zat I fluff so muchly. Zeez place eez ze favrit ov San Franciscans. Und zare eez ze secret staircase! Hoo wood haf known? Knot eye. Mein favrit drunxxxen chef, Julia Child fluffed zeez place, und wif gut reason! Tell Lam I said "Halllllllow!" when aryoooo veezit. (Special donkeys tou mein fiend Wendy Allen ov Fat Chance Belly Dance fur agreeking tou co-star in ze leetl moobie.)

properties.name: Mission Creek Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 968 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA "I leaned forward, and out of the corner of my eye, I saw someone fiddling with the computer cord. I tried to stand up, and as I stepped back, he stabbed me in the chest.\'\'

properties.name: Muddy's
properties.description: Posted by Jason  Valencia near 16th, SF, CAStrolled over here with Mike and Eric, so nice to be back in the hood.

properties.name: Naughty Customers Expect to be Seated at Empty Tables!
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne  399 Grove Street, San Francisco, CA, 94102We arrived between breakfast and lunch. The stoic host resolutely refused to allow us to be seated until each and every table was emptied from breakfast and set for lunch. He cared not a whit that I was feeling faint, nor did he shed a tear that the opera rehearsal would begin soon. He begrudgingly suggested waiting at the bar where the only possibly available seating was laden with coats of those perched on nearby stools. I guess I could have dealt with all o\'dat, but the last straw was when we were finally seated (much to the poor host\'s chagrin, I imagine) and the waitress asked if we\'d like bottled water or if tap water would be sufficient. I really hate how snooty restaurants present this choice by intimating that if you\'re a cheap bastard who doesn\'t care about your health, well then, by all means--go with the tap water. Sure, say I\'m being too harsh, but when kindly asked if we could just simply have a seat at a table and hold off on ordering until they were ready for lunch, the host maintained that we\'d simply have to wait. So we stood and waited like good citizens. Had I not had an opera engagement and been in need of nourishment beforehand, I\'d have marched out, but as it was with being rushed, feeling faint, and waiting for a friend I was caught like a rat in a trap. As it is, Citizen Cake is banished from my kingdom. I will admit to enjoying the marshmallow in my mocha, but no more than that. Fancy treats aren\'t worth putting up with rude hosts, and there are far too many delicacies beckoning from elsewhere for my attentions. Disclaimer: A delightful old comrade of mine once worked here and maybe still does. I know that *she* would never treat a chocolate-loving fellow citizen in this manner...so my apologies to those who don\'t harsh the mellow who may be Citizen Cake proles. Rosebud!

properties.name: Patricia und Baristas ov Martha & Bros. Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  3868 24th Street, San Francisco CA Beastsides ze best mocha on ice in ze weirld, Patricia und her gang ov baristas at Martha\'s in Noe Valley also hav ze bestest smiles in ze weirld! Arooooooooooousing! Free smile in every cup! Beans, caffeine dreenkies, pastries, outdoor seatings, fresh fruits in nicey beeg cups, stuffed muffins, coookies, und community. Now zat\'s wot wot ze Mad Ham lykes in ze caffffeeeeine shoppe. Openeded 5:30 am (KAK!) till 8:00 pm weekdays, und 6:00 am to 7:00 pm on ze weekends. 415.641.4433,

properties.name: Paul ov Starbucks Coffee Company
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  Bush and Divisadero, San Francisco CA At ze risk ov gettin\' mein ass cabbage kik-kikked tou ze curb by ze militant San Franciscans hoo donut lik chains und believe zat Starbucks donut really geev butt lip service tou ze ideals ov Fair Trade caffeeeeine, I breeengeth aryooo Paul ov ze Starbucks on Divisadero at Bush near Kaiser Permanente. Sure, Starbucks eez ze chain butt zay give eevin ze part-timingers ze health insurances und zay geev baxxx tou zare communities wif ze helpings ov nonprofits. Zay eevin gots ze altarooooooooooouistic mission statement. I donut nose--I tinkle ze corporate giving pogromme und ze insurance beats ze hell outta ze NOTHING zat menny cafffeeeeiiiiiine shoppes geev baxx tou zare \'hoods. Beastsides, zay hav pwitty und nicings baristas hoo nose zare way around ze beans, tou! I gotta say zat zare mmmmoooocccchas mayketh mee hoppy und ar consistently goood und creamy; zay kin alllso do ze good iced moooocha witch many fail miserabullllly at und should not eevin try. Anuzzle plus: zay gots ze bacon und sausage break fast snaxxxx. Now...about zem Fair Trade coffeeeeeeiiiine beans...

properties.name: Ritual Coffee Roasters
properties.description: Posted by Egoodman  1026 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA, 94110Demographically correct coffee spot - free WiFi plus Stumptown coffee. Good for meeting friends, not so good for getting work done.

properties.name: Sergio ov Fruitful Grounds
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   1813 Fulton Street, San Francisco CA Sergio, owner ov ze Fruitful Grounds, eez ze kyndely und efficient gentleman hoo nose heez beans! Zeez vun kin mayketh ze iced mocha, grill your burgher, or mayketh your fruity dreeenkie nice und smoooooooth. Best burger in ze Panhandle! Mushrooooms und swiss on myne, please. Vun thyme I gottsa ze turkey burger my mistake, und let mee telll aryooo, zat fuxxxer rockeded! Kizmet! Say, did aryooo nose aryoo kin allso get ze beer, whines, und hard cider heer? Yip Yip! CONSISTENTLY DELICIOUS MOCHAS UND BURGERS...NEVER ZE "OFF" DAY. MADAME GONZAGA GIVES FRUITFUL GROUNDS FOUR PAWLS UPPINKS!

properties.name: Starbucks Artisans
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne1390 Market Street, SF CAAs much as everybody loves to hate a chain, I have found San Francisco\'s Fox Plaza Starbucks to be filled with intelligent, kindly folk who really know their way around a mocha. Not only that, but many of them have other talents they share with the world as well. Featured in the photos herein with his whimsical caffeinated sculptural creations is coffee magician and artist Rudy Miguel, a solid person to trust with one\'s recommended daily dose of caffeine and art.

properties.name: Tom ov Squat und Gobble
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 237 Fillmore Street, San Francisco CA Despite ze off-pooting name und mad crazy way zay eez multiplying across ze City lyke randy rabbits (hoo kneads FOUR Squat und Gobbles in such ze small City?), cutening baristas und gut breakfasts kin bee had heer. I ham profoundly upset zat zay donut consent tou mayketh mee ze olde "Yellow Bird" from ze long-agoo menu, butt ze crab cakes wif spinach were ze suitabull substitute. Say...wot wot izzit \'bout zare chalkboard sign zat moist men (und some o\'ze ladies, tou) seem tou fluff so wellll?

properties.name: Ze Changs ov KK Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  252 Divisadero Street, San Francisco CA Even afore ze pea nutty miracle elixir "Signs und Wonders" was discovereded acause ov Jack\'s achin\' gums, I injoyed ze tummyfluff I felt when veeziting Margaret und Jack\'s happy nest. Ze hamburgles ar tasty und easy on ze pocketbooxxx! Allso, zay donut mynde ze wee doggings hoo always bee sniffinings at zare door. So aryooo kin imagine mein delightings when zay discufffered ze fountain ov youth on top ov their allredeye mouth-watering line-up ov ze snaxxx. Vun hamburgle und ze miracle, coming uppinks!

properties.name: steps of rome caffe
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 348 Columbus Ave, San Francisco, CAcrazy waiters and good food. always fun. love the tiramisu.
